subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Ohio State won its fourth consecutive game over Michigan, and if Wolverines Coach Lloyd Carr retires, as expected, it will mean that he ended his career with a 1-6 record against his rival Jim Tressel.
snippet: Ohio State won its fourth consecutive game over Michigan, and if Wolverines Coach Lloyd Carr retires, as expected, it will mean that he ended his career with a 1-6 record against his rival Jim Tressel.
